A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A very surprising and disappointing addition to the films. The Force Awakens and Rogue One each got 2 theater viewings from me... but what the heck happened with this installment? I'm not one to usually write reviews or give harsh ratings (I'm a pretty casual movie goer)\, but after thinking about this movie since seeing it I had to sign up and rate it. Of all the Star Wars stories that could have been told this movie takes a very different direction\, which may not have been bad if the writing didn't feel lackluster and if the plot was more rounded and polished (instead of the hollow\, plot-hole-filled-CGI-extravaganza we received). Definitely not of the 91% or 8.1/10 caliber currently on RT.
